problem_text_cn: 如图是以六边形的顶点为圆心,以1cm为半径画圆,则图中阴影部分面积的和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the apex of the hexagon is the center of the circle, and the circle is drawn with N_0 as the radius, then the sum of the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:根据六边形的内角和定理和扇形的面积公式,得S_{阴影}=\frac{720π×1}{360}=2π(cm²)．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题综合运用了六边形的内角和定理和扇形的面积公式．
